issue.title: Creating another Hydrashare
issue.body: I wish to fork and tinker with Hydra. Are all the files needed to build and run a Hydrashare website already on this repository?

issue.title: genBSDF example
issue.body:
Hi, I'd like to share a hydra grasshopper file that creates BSDF files when openstudio-2.4.0 is installed.

I later realized that this class has already been written in HB Plus. Perhaps we should update this example to fit it. At least people can get started using this one if they don't know code.

It automatically runs the rmtxop command also to visualize result.

(I think i need to create pull request for this thing to be shown at hydra??)

/Mathias

Hi, I'd like to share a hydra grasshopper file that creates BSDF files when openstudio-2.4.0 is installed.

I later realized that this class has already been written in HB Plus. Perhaps we should update this example to fit it. At least people can get started using this one if they don't know code.

issue.title: change full update to only parsing the updated forks
issue.body:
- [x] make authenticated Github API calls 
- [x] make a static version of current Hydras.  Currently the script exceeds 5 minutes limit of google scripts.
- [ ] update current script to only check the repositories that are updated after the *last_update*
- [ ] change insert to append and remove. Append the new ones and remove the ones that has been removed!

issue.title: borj bagh
Dynamo Customizer to Hydra
issue.body: @alfarok is possible to link [Dynamo Customizer](http://dynamobim.com/dynamo-customizer-beta-now-available/) to Hydra? We can add a new key to input.json where user can share the link and then we can embed the page in Hydra. That will be pretty cool IMO.

issue.title: Update Wiki for Dynamo
issue.body: Add Dynamo instructions/installation guide.

issue.title: Not all examples are being displayed for a given fork
issue.body: I have noticed that various examples are missing when we refresh the repo data.  I believe the data is refreshed a couple of times per hour but it appears the data that comes back is not consistent as some of my examples are randomly hidden hour to hour.  It appears the bug is that not all folders in each fork are properly pulled and posted.

issue.title: Rewrite the back-end to be more stable and handle more hits

milestone.title: Patreon goal improvements
milestone.description: The Improvements to be addressed as a part of meeting our Patreon goal!

issue.body:
I have noticed this issue for quite some time that the main hydrashare display page will include duplicate files at the bottom of the page and other example files that should be on this page do not display:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5567574/24932520/de0b7ec4-1edf-11e7-9093-e12d9e3025d2.png)

For example, I cannot find my Urban Weather Generator file on the main page right now because of this.

I have noticed that the missing files change with time and I guess this main page is just failing to find all of the files that it should.  I just wanted to put this up here in case anyone had any ideas about it.  Maybe we should try refreshing this page every 30 minutes instead of 15 minutes to see if this has any effect.

issue.title: Wind Rose Fixed Hours
issue.body:
This example file shows how to draw a wind rose for a repeated period of fixed hours.

This example can be used to plot wind rose for the night time ventilation.
